name: sysdig
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing sysdig cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`sysdig` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-sysdig).

provider.description:
The provider type for the sysdig package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
